description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Condition 13 (Refuse and Recycling) - Officers have reviewed the information submitted and are satisfied this can now be approved.
The declaration section in the application form is signed by a different person, please amend the application form with the correct names.
